Title: Roadrunners
Plot: Scully evades Doggett's help in investigating a vicious murder in a remote area of Utah, and she is trapped in the small town by a religious cult that believe a slug-like creature is the second coming of God who needs a human host to survive.
GuestStars: David Barry Gray, Lawrence Pressman, Conor O'Farrell, William O'Leary, Rusty Schwimmer, Todd Jeffries, Bryan Dilbeck
